info.title: timeghost
info.description: timeghost is a dedicated Microsoft 365 / Office 365 solution that integrates perfectly with your work environment. Generate time reports, invoices and other documents using the timeghost connector.

post.description: Returns an Excel file containing a report of the specified time.

parameters.description: Enter the workspace in which your data is stored

parameters.name: $filter-date-range
parameters.description: Filter times by range

parameters.name: $filter-user
parameters.description: Filter the times by user

parameters.name: groupedByProject
parameters.description: Project times are divided into workbooks

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for Excel report (overwrites date range) format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for Excel report (overwrites date range) format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ

deleted.description: Indicates whether the project is marked as deleted

created.description: Indicates when the project was created

modified.description: Indicates when the project was changed

status.description: Indicates whether the data record was just created, updated or deleted

id.description: Unique ID of the client of this project

billable.description: Indicates whether the project is marked as billable

completed.description: Indicates whether the project is marked as completed

estimation.description: The estimated budget of the project

id.description: Unique ID of the user of this project

billable.title: Billable

completed.description: Indicates whether the project is marked as completed
completed.title: Completed

estimation.description: The estimated budget of the project

created.description: Indicates when the client was created

modified.description: Indicates when the client was changed

status.description: Indicates whether the data record was just created, updated or deleted

deleted.description: Indicates whether the time is marked as deleted

billable.description: Indicates whether the time is marked as billable

id.description: Unique ID of the client of this time
Unique ID of the project of this time
Unique ID of the task of this time
Unique ID of the user of this time

timeDiff.description: The duration of the time entry

start.description: The start-date and start-time of the time entry

end.description: The end-date and end-time of the time entry

id.description: Unique ID of the tag of this time

created.description: Indicates when the time was created

modified.description: Indicates when the time was changed

status.description: Indicates whether the data record was just created, updated or deleted

name.description: The name of this time entry (task name)

start.description: The start-date and start-time of the time entry

end.description: The end-date and end-time of the time entry

billable.description: Indicates whether the time is marked as billable

deleted.description: Indicates whether the task is marked as deleted

created.description: Indicates when the task was created

modified.description: Indicates when the task was changed

status.description: Indicates whether the data record was just created, updated or deleted

id.description: Unique ID of the client of this task
Unique ID of the project of this task

estimation.description: The estimated budget of the task

deleted.description: Indicates whether the tag is marked as deleted

created.description: Indicates when the tag was created

modified.description: Indicates when the tag was changed

status.description: Indicates whether the data record was just created, updated or deleted

start.description: The start-date and start-time of the feed entry

end.description: The end-date and end-time of the feed entry

imageUrl.description: An icon Url, which is displayed in the feed entry. Best use 96px96px and https.

url.description: Url to an external address. E.g. a detail page. This link in the feed can be opened via the context menu.

category.description: Use a value that can be filtered later in the interface. For example 'Planner'.

id.description: Unique ID of the custom feed event

deleted.description: Indicates whether the custom feed event is marked as deleted

created.description: Indicates when the custom feed event was created

modified.description: Indicates when the custom feed event was changed

status.description: Indicates whether the data record was just created, updated or deleted

start.description: The start-date and start-time of the feed entry

end.description: The end-date and end-time of the feed entry

imageUrl.description: An icon Url, which is displayed in the feed entry. Best use 96px96px and https.

url.description: Url to an external address. E.g. a detail page. This link in the feed can be opened via the context menu.

category.description: This value can be used to filter the feeds in the interface.

deleted.description: Indicates whether the tag is marked as deleted

defaultWorkspace.description: The workspace Id of the default workspace of the user
